labels.text: The Mao Zedong portrait in this painting references the propaganda images popular during the Cultural Revolution. The superimposed red grid is a symbol for rationality and an allusion to a common method for reproducing and enlarging images. The painting caused major controversy when it first appeared because the presentation was a vast contrast to the traditional portrayal of political figures. Wang Guangyi belongs to the generation of artists who actively participated in the new wave movement during the 1980s; his worldview changed in response to a series of social changes beginning in 1989. His later paintings, which fuse American consumer brands and Chinese propaganda images, were the foundation for Political Pop during the 1990s.

The portrait of Mao Zedong in this painting references the propaganda images popular during the Cultural Revolution. The superimposed red grid is a symbol of rationality and an allusion to a common method for reproducing and enlarging images. The painting caused major controversy when it first appeared because the presentation was a sharp contrast with the traditional portrayal of political figures. Wang Guangyi belongs to the generation of artists who actively participated in the new wave movement during the 1980s; his worldview changed in response to a series of social changes beginning in 1989. His later paintings, which fuse American consumer brands and Chinese propaganda images, were the foundation for the Political Pop movement during the 1990s.

畫中的毛澤東肖像圖式來自於文革時期流行的政治宣傳畫。蓋於肖像之上的紅色網格除了象徵理性，也是複製及放大圖像的普遍方式。由於作品顛覆了一貫政治人物的肖像形式，因此首度面世時也引起過極大爭議。王廣義等一代藝術家積極投入到80年代的新潮運動中，但在80年代末到90年代初發生一系列的社會政治事件後使他的思想發生了變化。他的後期作品結合美國消費品牌與中國政治宣傳畫元素，為90年代的「政治波普」運動奠下基礎。
畫中的毛澤東肖像圖式來自於文革時期流行的政治宣傳畫。蓋於肖像之上的紅色網格除了象徵理性，也暗指複製及放大圖像的普遍方式。由於作品顛覆了政治人物肖像的傳統樣式，因此首度面世時也引起過極大爭議。王廣義等一代藝術家積極投入到八十年代的新潮運動中，但在1989年一系列的社會政治事件後，他的思想發生了變化。他後期的作品結合美國消費品牌與中國政治宣傳畫元素，為九十年代的「政治波普」運動奠下基礎。

images.AltText: Oil painting on canvas depicting Mao Zedong in black and white. A grid of thick red lines covers the portrait and features an uppercase letter A in our upper left and lower right, and an uppercase O in our upper right and lower left.
images.AltTextTC: 油彩布本作品上，以黑白兩色繪上毛澤東肖像，肖像上有粗闊的紅色網格覆蓋。畫面左上角和右下角繪上大楷英文字母A，右上角和左下角則繪上大楷英文字母O。
